description: Cross Marian is an Exorcist and General of the religious organization, the Black Order. He is the master of Allen Walker, and one of the only people who knew of Mana Walker`s true intentions concerning the boy. He can be very demanding, disrespectful, and temperamental. However, despite his flaws, he shows that he does have a softer side, though it`s usually only seen with Allen or women, like Anita and Lenalee. The latter even managing to keep him from running away from The Order again.
name: Cross Marian
